info.title: catalogue-api
info.description: NHS Digital GP IT Futures Buying Catalog API

get.summary: Get existing Capability/s which are in the given Framework

parameters.name: frameworkId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of Framework

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

get.summary:
Get an existing capability given its CRM identifier
Typically used to retrieve previous version

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: CRM identifier of capability to find

404.description: No capabilities not found in CRM

post.summary: Get several existing capabilities given their CRM identifiers

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Array of CRM identifiers of capabilities to find

get.summary: Get existing Capability/s which require the given/optional Standard

parameters.name: standardId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of Standard

parameters.name: isOptional
parameters.description: true if the specified Standard is optional with the Capability

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

get.summary: Retrieve all current capabilities in a paged list

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

200.description: Success - if no capabilities found, return empty list

get.summary: Retrieve claim, given the claim’s CRM identifier

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: CRM identifier of claim

get.summary:
Retrieve all claimed capabilities for a solution in a paged list,
given the solution’s CRM identifier

parameters.name: solutionId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of solution

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

put.summary: Update an existing claimed capability with new information

parameters.name: claimedcapability
parameters.description: claimed capability with updated information

404.description: Solution or ClaimedCapability not found in CRM

post.summary: Create a new claimed capability for a solution

parameters.name: claimedcapability
parameters.description: new claimed capability information

delete.summary: Delete an existing claimed capability for a solution

parameters.name: claimedcapability
parameters.description: existing claimed capability information

get.summary:
Get all Evidence for the given Claim
Each list is a distinct 'chain' of Evidence ie original Evidence with all subsequent Evidence
The first item in each 'chain' is the most current Evidence.
The last item in each 'chain' is the original Evidence.

parameters.name: claimId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of Claim

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

parameters.name: evidence
parameters.description: new evidence information

get.summary:
Get all Reviews for a CapabilitiesImplemented
Each list is a distinct 'chain' of Review ie original Review with all subsequent Review
The first item in each 'chain' is the most current Review.
The last item in each 'chain' is the original Review.

parameters.name: evidenceId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of CapabilitiesImplementedEvidence

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

post.summary: Create a new Review for a CapabilitiesImplemented

parameters.name: review
parameters.description: new Review information

get.summary: Get capabilities with a list of corresponding, optional standards
Retrieve all contacts for an organisation in a paged list, given the organisation’s CRM identifier

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of organisation

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

get.summary:
Retrieve a contacts for an organisation, given the contact’s email address
Email address is case insensitive

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: email address to search for

get.summary: Retrieve a contact for an organisation, given the contact’s CRM identifier

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: CRM identifier of contact

get.summary: Get existing framework/s which have the given capability

parameters.name: capabilityId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of Capability

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

get.summary: Get existing framework/s which have the given standard

parameters.name: standardId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of Standard

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

get.summary:
Get an existing framework given its CRM identifier
Typically used to retrieve previous version

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: CRM identifier of framework to find

get.summary: Get existing framework/s on which a solution was onboarded, given the CRM identifier of the solution

parameters.name: solutionId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of solution

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

get.summary: Retrieve all current frameworks in a paged list

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

200.description: Success - if no frameworks found, return empty list

post.summary: Create a link between a Framework and a Solution

parameters.name: frameworkId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of Framework

parameters.name: solutionId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of Solution

404.description: One entity not found or link already exists

get.summary: Retrieve an Organisation for the given Contact

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of Contact

get.summary:
Get existing solution/s which are related to the given keyword
Keyword is not case sensitive

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: keyword describing a solution or capability

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

get.summary:
Get existing solution/s on which were onboarded onto a framework,
given the CRM identifier of the framework

parameters.name: frameworkId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of organisation to find

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

get.summary:
Get an existing solution given its CRM identifier
Typically used to retrieve previous version

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: CRM identifier of solution to find

get.summary:
Retrieve all current solutions in a paged list for an organisation,
given the organisation’s CRM identifier

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of organisation

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

put.summary: Update an existing solution with new information

parameters.name: solution
parameters.description: contact with updated information

404.description: Organisation or solution not found in CRM

post.summary: Create a new solution for an organisation

parameters.name: solution
parameters.description: new solution information

get.summary: Get a Solution with a list of corresponding TechnicalContact, ClaimedCapability, ClaimedStandard et al

parameters.name: solutionId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of Solution

put.summary: Update an existing Solution, TechnicalContact, ClaimedCapability, ClaimedStandard et al with new information

parameters.name: solnEx
parameters.description: Solution, TechnicalContact, ClaimedCapability, ClaimedStandard et al with updated information

404.description: Solution, TechnicalContact, ClaimedCapability, ClaimedStandard et al not found in CRM

get.summary: Get existing/optional Standard/s which are in the given Capability

parameters.name: capabilityId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of Capability

parameters.name: isOptional
parameters.description: true if the specified Standard is optional with the Capability

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

get.summary: Get existing Standard/s which are in the given Framework

parameters.name: frameworkId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of Framework

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

get.summary:
Get an existing standard given its CRM identifier

parameters.description: CRM identifier of standard to find

parameters.name: pageIndex

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

200.description: Success - if no standards found, return empty list

Retrieve all claimed standards for a solution in a paged list,
 given the solution’s CRM identifier

parameters.name: claimedstandard

404.description: Solution or ClaimedStandard not found in CRM

parameters.description: new claimed standard information

delete.summary: Delete an existing claimed standard for a solution

parameters.name: claimedstandard
parameters.description: existing claimed standard information

get.summary:
Get all Evidence for the given Claim
Each list is a distinct 'chain' of Evidence ie original Evidence with all subsequent Evidence
The first item in each 'chain' is the most current Evidence.
The last item in each 'chain' is the original Evidence.

parameters.name: claimId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of Claim

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

parameters.name: evidence
parameters.description: new evidence information

get.summary:
Get all Reviews for a StandardsApplicable
Each list is a distinct 'chain' of Review ie original Review with all subsequent Review
The first item in each 'chain' is the most current Review.
The last item in each 'chain' is the original Review.

parameters.name: evidenceId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of StandardsApplicableEvidence

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

post.summary: Create a new Review for a StandardsApplicable

parameters.name: review
parameters.description: new Review information

get.summary:
Retrieve all Technical Contacts for a solution in a paged list,
given the solution’s CRM identifier

parameters.name: solutionId
parameters.description: CRM identifier of solution

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of page to return.  Defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of items per page.  Defaults to 20

put.summary: Update a Technical Contact with new information

parameters.name: techCont
parameters.description: Technical Contact with updated information

404.description: Technical Contact or Solution not found in CRM

post.summary: Create a new Technical Contact for a Solution

parameters.name: techCont
parameters.description: new Technical Contact information

delete.summary: Delete an existing Technical Contact for a Solution

parameters.name: techCont
parameters.description: existing Technical Contact information

404.description: Technical Contact or Solution not found in CRM

pageIndex.description:
1-based index of which page this page
Defaults to 1

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on NHSD.GPITF.BuyingCatalog.Models.PaginatedList`1.PageSize

pageSize.description:
Maximum number of items in this page
Defaults to 20

hasPreviousPage.description: true if there is a page of items previous to this page

hasNextPage.description: true if there is a page of items after this page

Capabilities.description:
A list of potential competencies a ‘solution’ can perform or provide eg
* Mobile working
* Training
* Prescribing
* Installation
Note that a ‘capability’ has a link to zero or one previous ‘capability’
Generally, only interested in current ‘capability’

previousId.description: Unique identifier of previous version of entity

name.description: Name of Capability, as displayed to a user

description.description: Description of Capability, as displayed to a user

CapabilitiesImplemented.description:
A ‘capability’ which a ‘solution’ asserts that it provides.
This is then assessed by NHS to verify the ‘solution’ complies with the ‘capability’ it has claimed.

pageIndex.description:
1-based index of which page this page
Defaults to 1

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on NHSD.GPITF.BuyingCatalog.Models.PaginatedList`1.PageSize

pageSize.description:
Maximum number of items in this page
Defaults to 20

hasPreviousPage.description: true if there is a page of items previous to this page

hasNextPage.description: true if there is a page of items after this page

pageIndex.description:
1-based index of which page this page
Defaults to 1

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on NHSD.GPITF.BuyingCatalog.Models.PaginatedList`1.PageSize

pageSize.description:
Maximum number of items in this page
Defaults to 20

hasPreviousPage.description: true if there is a page of items previous to this page

hasNextPage.description: true if there is a page of items after this page

CapabilitiesImplementedEvidence.description:
A piece of 'evidence' which supports a claim to a ‘capability’.
This is then assessed by NHS to verify the ‘solution’ complies with the ‘capability’ it has claimed.

previousId.description: Unique identifier of previous version of entity

createdById.description:
Unique identifier of Contact who created record
Derived from calling context
SET ON SERVER

createdOn.description:
UTC date and time at which record created
Set by server when creating record
SET ON SERVER

pageIndex.description:
1-based index of which page this page
Defaults to 1

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on NHSD.GPITF.BuyingCatalog.Models.PaginatedList`1.PageSize

pageSize.description:
Maximum number of items in this page
Defaults to 20

hasPreviousPage.description: true if there is a page of items previous to this page

hasNextPage.description: true if there is a page of items after this page

CapabilitiesImplementedReviews.description:
Initially, a 'message' or response to 'evidence' which supports a claim to a ‘capability’.
Thereafter, this will be a response to a previous message/response.

previousId.description: Unique identifier of previous version of entity

createdById.description:
Unique identifier of Contact who created record
Derived from calling context
SET ON SERVER

createdOn.description:
UTC date and time at which record created
Set by server when creating record
SET ON SERVER

CapabilityMappings.description: All CapabilityMapping with all corresponding Standard

CapabilityMapping.description: A single Capability with its corresponding OptionalStandard

Standards.description:
A formal set of requirements eg  * ISO 9001
Note that a ‘standard’ has a link to zero or one previous ‘standard’
Generally, only interested in current ‘standard’

previousId.description: Unique identifier of previous version of entity

isOverarching.description: True if this standard applies to all solutions

name.description: Name of Standard, as displayed to a user

description.description: Description of Standard, as displayed to a user

OptionalStandard.description: A Standard and a flag associated with a Capability through a CapabilityMapping

isOptional.description: True if the Standard does not have to be supported in order to support the Capability

pageIndex.description:
1-based index of which page this page
Defaults to 1

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on NHSD.GPITF.BuyingCatalog.Models.PaginatedList`1.PageSize

pageSize.description:
Maximum number of items in this page
Defaults to 20

hasPreviousPage.description: true if there is a page of items previous to this page

hasNextPage.description: true if there is a page of items after this page

Contacts.description:
A means of communicating with an organisation, typically a person, email address, telephone number etc.
Standard MS Dynamics CRM entity

pageIndex.description:
1-based index of which page this page
Defaults to 1

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on NHSD.GPITF.BuyingCatalog.Models.PaginatedList`1.PageSize

pageSize.description:
Maximum number of items in this page
Defaults to 20

hasPreviousPage.description: true if there is a page of items previous to this page

hasNextPage.description: true if there is a page of items after this page

Frameworks.description: An agreement between an ‘organisation’ and NHS which allows a ‘solution’ to be purchased.  There may be more than one active or current ‘framework’ at any point in time  Note that a ‘framework’ has a link to zero or one previous ‘framework’  Generally, only interested in current ‘framework’

previousId.description: Unique identifier of previous version of entity

name.description: Name of Framework, as displayed to a user

description.description: Description of Framework, as displayed to a user

Organisations.description:
A 'Supplier' is a company who supplies ‘solutions’ to NHS buyers.
A 'Buyer' is a company who purchases 'solutions' from a 'Supplier'.
An 'Admin' is a company, typically NHS Digital, who has ultimate control over all information in the Buying Catalog.
Standard MS Dynamics CRM entity

name.description: Name of a company, as displayed to the user

primaryRoleId.description:
Primary ODS role code for company
Suppliers have a primary role of "RO92"

pageIndex.description:
1-based index of which page this page
Defaults to 1

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on NHSD.GPITF.BuyingCatalog.Models.PaginatedList`1.PageSize

pageSize.description:
Maximum number of items in this page
Defaults to 20

hasPreviousPage.description: true if there is a page of items previous to this page

hasNextPage.description: true if there is a page of items after this page

SolutionEx.description: An Extended Solution with its corresponding Technical Contacts, ClaimedCapability, ClaimedStandard et al

Solutions.description:
A product and/or service provided by an ‘organisation’.
Note that a ‘solution’ has a link to zero or one previous ‘solution’
Generally, only interested in current ‘solution’
Standard MS Dynamics CRM entity

previousId.description: Unique identifier of previous version of entity

createdById.description:
Unique identifier of Contact who created this entity
Derived from calling context
SET ON SERVER

createdOn.description:
UTC date and time at which record created
Set by server when creating record
SET ON SERVER

modifiedById.description:
Unique identifier of Contact who last modified this entity
Derived from calling context
SET ON SERVER

modifiedOn.description:
UTC date and time at which record last modified
Set by server when creating record
SET ON SERVER

name.description: Name of solution, as displayed to a user

description.description: Description of solution, as displayed to a user

StandardsApplicable.description:
A ‘Standard’ which a ‘Solution’ asserts that it provides.
This is then assessed by NHS to verify the ‘Solution’ complies with the ‘Standard’ it has claimed.

TechnicalContacts.description:
A means of communicating with an Organisation, typically a person, email address, telephone number etc,
in the context of a Solution

contactType.description:
Description of type of TechnicalContact eg
<list type="bullet">
Lead Contact
Technical Contact
Executive Sponsor
Clinical Safety Officer
Connection Agreement Signatory
Other...
</list>
